tooltip: A simple node.js application intended to showcase how to read analog data from a Grove Starter Kit Plus IoT Intel Edition Temperature Sensor, start a web server and communicate wirelessly using WebSockets. The HTML5 companion app is visible under HTML5 Companion Hybrid Mobile or Web App > Samples and Demos > General (HTML5 + Cordova) panel.
description: A simple node.js application intended to showcase how to read analog data from a Grove Starter Kit Plus IoT Intel Edition Temperature Sensor, start a web server and communicate wirelessly using WebSockets. The HTML5 companion app is visible under HTML5 Companion Hybrid Mobile or Web App > Samples and Demos > General (HTML5 + Cordova) panel.
title: Local Temperature
